title: Sydney .NET user group - August
eventShortDescription:
​NOTE
For this session only, the user group will be held at:
The Licensee's Flat 
Upstairs at The Oaks
118 Military Rd,
Neutral Bay 

"Lessons from the trenches with AngularJS in the Enterprise" - Duncan Hunter

In this talk Duncan will cover the 10 main questions any developer will have to ask themselves when making an Angular application in .NET today. 

The talk will cover the following:
1. A brief introduction to Angular and why it has dominated the front end framework space.
2. The top ten questions you need to ask yourself when starting and Angular application in .NET today. This will draw on the lessons learnt building enterprise applications with Angular at SSW


About the presenter: 
Duncan Hunter loves working in passionate teams to make awesome software. Making sustainable software that solves real world issues is what makes Duncan tick. He is a full stack developer using Azure, AngularJS, TypeScript, ASP.NET and BreezeJS. He lives and works in Sydney making software for the Nutrition Industry and is the founder of foodzone.com.au and nutritionexperts.com.au.

Can't come in person? No worries! 
We live stream the event so you can watch it from anywhere! Catch all the action live on Wednesday August 19 from 6:30pm here: http://www.ssw.com.au/ssw/NETUG/Live.aspx
